resources.string: Welcome to FlorIDA Tourism! We\'d like to show you the finest places to go and see in Florida, and this app will help you accomplish that!
Before we can start, we need to get our most up-to-date information from the Internet. If that\'s okay, tap the button below.
Alright! Hang tight. This\'ll only take a moment.
Uh-oh! Something went wrong... We weren\'t able to connect to the Internet. Check to make sure that your device\'s Internet connect is enabled and working and try again.
Check out this list of all of our exciting locations right here in Florida!
